explains: adj. 注意的，专心的；贴心的

sentences.en: The hotel staff are friendly and attentive.
sentences.cn: 旅馆人员友好而且照顾周到。

sentences.en: Service was attentive and the meal proceeded at a leisurely pace.
sentences.cn: 服务很周到，饭吃得悠闲从容。

sentences.en: He wishes the government would be more attentive to detail in their response.
sentences.cn: 他希望政府在回应时能更注意细节。
